replies.body: Kinda feels like ascension but blood moon style.
Why no Teemo?
Because they want the game mode to be fun
also because AP shaco already makes getting around the map without dying to traps a horrible experience. Throw a teemo in there and I think most people would just give up and afk at foundtain.
all skins should be disabled and a temporary compulsory bloodmoon skin for all assassin type champs in this mode :)
noooooo my parents just banned me from lol for a month so im gonna miss out {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
noice glhf
Personally I'd like to see {{champion:76}} {{champion:421}} and {{champion:24}} added.
ya nidalee would we nicee as she's actually classified as an assassin :/ {{champion:76}}
ya

One issue I have with this map is that there are no Armor items for AD champs.

As AP you have {{item:3157}} for AR and {{item:3001}} for MR if you want to go a bit tanky. As AD you have lots of MR ({{item:3156}} ,{{item:3814}} ,{{item:3139}} ,{{item:3091}} ) but no AR item other than...{{item:3060}} I guess?
Zhonias Yasou?
I think the champ pool really needs to be increased. Every games it's rengar/kha/Shaco/zed with lee, LB, Diana, Kat, ahri, and akali making up the rest in smaller measures.
trueeee
Is there a Blood Moon Icon you get if you win on the new game-mode? {{item:3632}}
Does this mean the Blood Moon skins are out ?
No. They'll most likely be released tomorrow.
I'm pretty sure {{champion:11}}  is an assassin???
Why no YI and you should give us blood moon skins with it

Some feedback for the game mode.

The ending seems a bit off. 
- When the enemy are defeated, there should be a drum sound (like the instrument of the Blood Moon theme) to make it sounds more rewarding.
- The enemies' corpses should remain on the field.

Yay,

Completely unrelated,  WHERE THE * do i find the information on IP rewarding system ,
Is IP rewarding amounts different for solo/duo and ranked 5's queues?
Is it dependant on if your queuing on your own or in groups ?
Is Ip rewards a lot lower for time invested for Aram or about the same as Rift ?

Thanks.
pretty sure you could look those questions up but the answer to your questions are all YES im pretty sure, don't quote me though..
